attributes.action: Help dispel the undemocratic 'demonisation' of the BNP in the public mind, the media,should give us unbiased coverage on TV at election times, this 'no platform policy' is not in the spirit of true Democracy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After sudying the BNP in great detail, I have joined the Party. I have networked  with other members and supporters, I consider their policies to be Honest and Democratic, like any political Party we contain members from all walks of life,and shades of opinion I can assure you that I have not met any potential terrorists,or genocidal maniacs, just Patriots who oppose a British Islamic State. We in the BNP deserve a platform to explain our policies, like that afforded to all other political Parties. We have massive support from the public already, despite all the bad press!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
